Identification.LongTitle: European Security and Defence Policy Service Medal Order

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the European Security and Defence Policy Service Medal with a bar denoting the specific mission, in recognition of honourable service in European Union-led crisis-management operations conducted within the scope of Title V of the Treaty on European Union since January 28, 2003; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that the Medal follow the International Force East Timor Medal in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
